name: Storage and transfer
description: These devices store and transfer energy from Generators. Cables and Energy Cells are the primary way to transfer and store energy. $(p)The $(l:store_and_transfer:ender_network)Ender Network$(/l) stores and transfers energy without cables! An Ender Network is made up of Ender Cells and Ender Gates. $(l:item_charging/battery)Batteries$(/l) provide portable energy storage.
